requirements.summary: Diagnose and fix the black screen issue where the entire page background is black, making content invisible except for a pink heart icon at the bottom
acceptanceCriteria: Page background uses the intended warm sepia/ink color scheme defined in index.css
All content is visible without requiring text selection
The manga list, controls, and all UI elements are properly displayed with correct colors

file_operations.description: Review and fix the CSS configuration to ensure the warm sepia/ink color palette is properly applied to the page background. Check that the root element and body have the correct background colors defined and that dark mode overrides are not causing the black screen. Verify Tailwind color utility classes are correctly configured and accessible.

Verify that the main layout wrapper applies the correct background color classes and that no inline styles or className overrides are setting the background to black. Ensure the layout properly inherits the color scheme from index.css and that all sections (header, main, footer) have appropriate background/text color assignments.
Check that the root App component does not apply any background color overrides that could cause the black screen. Ensure wrapper divs and loading states use the correct color scheme from the theme.

requirements.summary: Ensure text content is visible by default without requiring mouse drag selection to reveal it
acceptanceCriteria: All text elements have proper text color that contrasts with the background
Text is readable immediately on page load without any user interaction
No text elements have transparent or matching-background colors

file_operations.description: Review and fix text color definitions in the CSS. Ensure default text colors provide sufficient contrast with backgrounds. Check that no global styles are setting text colors to transparent, black-on-black, or other invisible combinations. Verify Tailwind text color utilities are properly configured.

Verify that all text elements in the manga list page have explicit text color classes that contrast with their backgrounds. Check that loading states, error messages, and empty states all use visible text colors.
Ensure manga card text content (titles, ratings, chapter counts) uses contrasting text colors. Verify that hover states and interactive elements maintain text visibility.
Check that all control labels, buttons, and input fields have visible text colors that contrast with their backgrounds. Ensure search inputs and filter controls are readable.
Verify header and footer text (logo, title, button labels) all use contrasting text colors that are visible against their backgrounds.

requirements.summary: Verify the pink heart icon at the bottom is styled correctly and check if it should be visible or if it's an unintended element
acceptanceCriteria: Identify the source of the pink heart icon
Ensure it's either properly styled with the app theme or removed if unintended
Footer elements display with correct colors and positioning

file_operations.description: Locate the pink heart icon in the footer section. Verify if it's an intentional design element or artifact. If it's a 'Made with ❤️' footer element, ensure it uses the correct theme colors (amber/gold instead of pink). If unintended, remove it. Ensure all footer elements have proper styling consistent with the warm sepia/ink theme.
Check if there are any heart icons or emoji in the HTML template that might be rendering with incorrect colors. Verify the root div and any static HTML content uses appropriate styling.
